name: Red Shuriken
description:
Red Shuriken is a platformer where you have to shoot all the targets as fast as possible. The shurikens will help you to get the best highscore! There are 3 different levels (plains, cave and desert) and a tutorial-level to play. Watch out for buttons and cracking blocks.

This game was made using the Free Platform Game Assets by BayatGames but most of the assets are edited or made by myself.
